skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Every parent wants their children to get the very best education they can, but with the public school system having the problems it is currently experiencing and private schools not being financially available to all, many parents are turning back to homeschooling. Homeschooling is not a new idea; in fact our public school system is newer than parents teaching their children at home. Find out more Home Schooling Tips tricks and advices , from our daily Flash Briefings. Just Enable our Skill and …. Enjoy ! The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
